name: 3.6.0 release
desc: Quests & Dialogue version 3.6.0 major release.
descList: Using soft classes instead of hard references in C++
Unused return bool removed from Narrative Events
Added Set/Get speaker code to C++
Added PreQuestStarted event that runs before BeginQuest runs
Added SetTracked function to track / untrack quests
Added dialogue priority to block lower priority dialogue from starting
Added player adjust transform to stop the player from moving
Added Sound attenuation to change how sound is played

name: Events will not run on load
desc: When loading a save game, events will now no longer run on each node.

name: Event loading option
desc: When loading a save game, events now have the option to choose whether they load every time or not.
